thread.title: Mississippi Weather Update: Overnight Lows Drop to 30s Across Jackson and Surrounding Areas Tonight

author: County Herald Weather Center
title: Mississippi Weather Update: Overnight Lows Drop to 30s Across Jackson and Surrounding Areas Tonight
text:
By County Herald Weather Center ,
2 hours ago Jackson, MS â€“ Chilly temperatures are expected to settle across Mississippi tonight, with lows dipping into the mid-30s in Jackson and nearby towns. Residents should prepare for patchy fog, especially after 11 p.m., potentially affecting visibility on major roadways, including I-55 and Highway 49. According to the National Weather...
